summary: AN ORDINANCE making a major revision of the Street Use Ordinance, Seattle Municipal Code Title 15 (Ordinance 90047, as amended) amending about 110 sections, adding about 60 new sections, and repealing 20 sections or parts thereof; transferring Section 15.48.030 to the Criminal Code as 12A.14.083; and providing new methods of enforcement, and increasing certain criminal penalties.
